mapper.insert:
insert into krm_employees
ID, OA_CODE, EMP_BASE_ADDR, NAME, GENDER, EMP_DATE_, POSI_DATE, SRV_LENGTH, DEPARTMENT, DUTY, ID_CODE, BIR_DATE, AGE, TEL, QQ, PER_EMAIL, SALA_CARD, SHB_GJJ_LINE, SHB_BASE_LINE, GJJ_BASE_LINE, SHB_START_MON, GJJ_START_MON, JF_TYPE, HOME_ADDR, HT_DATE, IS_MARRY, NATION, GRADUATE, EDUCATION, SPECILIALITION, GRADUATE_TIME, WORK_LEVEL, NOW_ADDRESS, EMR_TEL, COM_EMAIL, RESR_FLD01, RESR_FLD02, RESR_FLD03, RESR_FLD04, RESR_FLD05, RESR_FLD06, RESR_FLD07, RESR_FLD08, RESR_FLD09, RESR_FLD10, RESR_FLD11, RESR_FLD12, RESR_FLD13, RESR_FLD14, RESR_FLD15,
#{id}, #{oaCode}, #{empBaseAddr}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{empDate}, #{posiDate}, #{srvLength}, #{department}, #{duty}, #{idCode}, #{birDate}, #{age}, #{tel}, #{qq}, #{perEmail}, #{salaCard}, #{shbGjjLine}, #{shbBaseLine}, #{gjjBaseLine}, #{shbStartMon}, #{gjjStartMon}, #{jfType}, #{homeAddr}, #{htDate}, #{isMarry}, #{nation}, #{graduate}, #{education}, #{specilialition}, #{graduateTime}, #{workLevel}, #{nowAddress}, #{emrTel}, #{comEmail}, #{resrFld01}, #{resrFld02}, #{resrFld03}, #{resrFld04}, #{resrFld05}, #{resrFld06}, #{resrFld07}, #{resrFld08}, #{resrFld09}, #{resrFld10}, #{resrFld11}, #{resrFld12}, #{resrFld13}, #{resrFld14}, #{resrFld15},

delete from krm_employees where ID in
#{id}

update.foreach: update krm_employees set ID = #{id} , OA_CODE = #{oaCode} , EMP_BASE_ADDR = #{empBaseAddr} , NAME = #{name} , GENDER = #{gender} , EMP_DATE_ = #{empDate} , POSI_DATE = #{posiDate} , SRV_LENGTH = #{srvLength} , DEPARTMENT = #{department} , DUTY = #{duty} , ID_CODE = #{idCode} , BIR_DATE = #{birDate} , AGE = #{age} , TEL = #{tel} , QQ = #{qq} , PER_EMAIL = #{perEmail} , SALA_CARD = #{salaCard} , SHB_GJJ_LINE = #{shbGjjLine} , SHB_BASE_LINE = #{shbBaseLine} , GJJ_BASE_LINE = #{gjjBaseLine} , SHB_START_MON = #{shbStartMon} , GJJ_START_MON = #{gjjStartMon} , JF_TYPE = #{jfType} , HOME_ADDR = #{homeAddr} , HT_DATE = #{htDate} , IS_MARRY = #{isMarry} , NATION = #{nation} , GRADUATE = #{graduate} , EDUCATION = #{education} , SPECILIALITION = #{specilialition} , GRADUATE_TIME = #{graduateTime} , WORK_LEVEL = #{workLevel} , NOW_ADDRESS = #{nowAddress} , EMR_TEL = #{emrTel} , COM_EMAIL = #{comEmail} , RESR_FLD01 = #{resrFld01} , RESR_FLD02 = #{resrFld02} , RESR_FLD03 = #{resrFld03} , RESR_FLD04 = #{resrFld04} , RESR_FLD05 = #{resrFld05} , RESR_FLD06 = #{resrFld06} , RESR_FLD07 = #{resrFld07} , RESR_FLD08 = #{resrFld08} , RESR_FLD09 = #{resrFld09} , RESR_FLD10 = #{resrFld10} , RESR_FLD11 = #{resrFld11} , RESR_FLD12 = #{resrFld12} , RESR_FLD13 = #{resrFld13} , RESR_FLD14 = #{resrFld14} , RESR_FLD15 = #{resrFld15} ID = #{id}
